com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sql

Interface SqlBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SqliteBuilder

    public interface SqlBuilder

    SqlBuilder is used to dynamically construct SQL strings for table generation and queries at runtime.

    Version:
    1.0 02/13/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Detail

      • createTables

        int createTables(SqliteDbHelper dbHelper)
                 throws ModelConfigurationException
        Creates the model tables for the application in the SQLite database as configured in infinitum.cfg.xml and returns the numbers of tables created.
        Parameters:
        dbHelper - the SqliteDbHelper encapsulating the InfinitumContext for this application
        Returns:
        number of tables created
        Throws:
        ModelConfigurationException - if table(s) cannot be created due to a misconfigured model. For example, a model that does not contain any persistent Fields
        InfinitumConfigurationException - if domain classes have not been properly configured in infinitum.cfg.xml

      • dropTables

        int dropTables(SqliteDbHelper dbHelper)
        Drops the model tables from the application's SQLite database and returns the number of tables dropped.
        Parameters:
        dbHelper - the SqliteDbHelper encapsulating the InfinitumContext for this application
        Returns:
        number of tables dropped

      • createManyToManyJoinQuery

        java.lang.String createManyToManyJoinQuery(ManyToManyRelationship rel,
                                         java.io.Serializable id,
                                         java.lang.Class<?> direction)
                                           throws InfinitumRuntimeException
        Generates a SQL query String from the given ManyToManyRelationship which retrieves rows of the given direction type which are associated with the given ID.

        For example, assume you have the models Foo and Bar which have a many-to-many association and are mapped to the tables foo and bar respectively with the relationships being stored in foobar. Calling createManyToManyJoinQuery(rel, 42, Bar.class) would generate a query that would retrieve all records of Bar associated with the instance of Foo which has an ID of 42.

        Parameters:
        rel - the ManyToManyRelationship containing the association being queried
        id - the ID in which the associated records are linked with
        direction - the direction the relationship is being queried in, returning records of this Class
        Returns:
        SQL query
        Throws:
        InfinitumRuntimeException - if the direction Class is not a part of the given ManyToManyRelationship

      • createDeleteStaleRelationshipQuery

        java.lang.String createDeleteStaleRelationshipQuery(ManyToManyRelationship rel,
                                                  java.lang.Object model,
                                                  java.util.List<java.io.Serializable> relatedKeys)
        Generates a SQL String consisting of the query for deleting stale many-to-many relationships.

        For example: DELETE FROM foo_bar WHERE foo_id = 42 AND bar_id NOT IN (8, 12, 38) . This query will be used to clear relationships which no longer exist.

        Parameters:
        rel - the ManyToManyRelationship for this relationship query
        model - the model containing the relationship
        relatedKeys - the List containing the IDs of entities which are still related
        Returns:
        String containing the SQL query

      • createUpdateForeignKeyQuery

        java.lang.String createUpdateForeignKeyQuery(OneToManyRelationship rel,
                                           java.lang.Object model,
                                           java.util.List<java.io.Serializable> relatedKeys)
        Generates a SQL String consisting of the query for updating the foreign keys in a one-to-many relationship.
        Parameters:
        rel - the OneToManyRelationship for this relationship query
        model - the model containing the relationship
        relatedKeys - the List containing the IDs of entities which are no longer related
        Returns:
        String containing the SQL query

      • createUpdateOneToOneForeignKeyQuery

        java.lang.String createUpdateOneToOneForeignKeyQuery(OneToOneRelationship relationship,
                                                   java.lang.Object model,
                                                   java.lang.Object related)
        Generates a SQL statement for updating the foreign key in a one-to-one relationship.
        Parameters:
        relationship - the OneToOneRelationship for this relationship query
        model - the model containing the foreign key to update
        related - the related entity
        Returns:
        SQL update query

      • createManyToManyDeleteQuery

        java.lang.String createManyToManyDeleteQuery(java.lang.Object obj,
                                           ManyToManyRelationship rel)
        Generates an SQL query String for deleting relationships from a many-to-many table.
        Parameters:
        obj - owner of the relationship to be deleted
        rel - the relationship type
        Returns:
        SQL query

      • createUpdateQuery

        java.lang.String createUpdateQuery(java.lang.Object model,
                                 java.lang.Object related,
                                 java.lang.String column)
        Generates an SQL query String for updating a model relationship.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to update
        related - the related model
        column - the foreign key column
        Returns:
        SQL query
